entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 12:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers and ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
